mapper.sql: SELECT equ.id AS equipment_id, company.NAME AS company_name, dept.NAME AS dept_name, equ.NAME AS equipment_name, cabinet.NAME AS cabinet_name, et.NAME AS equipment_type_name, em.NAME AS equipment_model_name, site.NAME AS site_name, room.NAME AS machine_room_name, pt.id AS port_info_id, pt.serial_number AS port_info_index

FROM lock_port_info AS pt INNER JOIN lock_equipment AS equ on equ.id = pt.equipment_id INNER JOIN lock_cabinet AS cabinet ON cabinet.id = equ.cabinet_id AND cabinet.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN lock_machine_room AS room ON room.id = cabinet.machine_room_id AND room.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN lock_site AS site ON site.id = room.site_id AND site.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN lock_dept AS dept ON dept.id = equ.dept_id AND dept.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN lock_equipment_type AS et ON et.id = equ.equipment_type_id AND et.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN lock_equipment_model AS em ON em.id = equ.equipment_model_id AND em.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN lock_company AS company ON company.id = dept.company_id AND company.del_flag = '0'
mapper.select:
,pt.user_code AS port_info_user_code
where equ.del_flag = '0'
order by equ.id desc

,temp.validity_period,temp.create_time,temp.id ,temp.lock_serial_number AS port_info_user_code,temp.serial_number as serial_number
INNER JOIN (SELECT pt.id as ptid,rel.validity_period,rel.create_time,rel.id,rel.lock_serial_number AS port_info_user_code,rel.serial_number as serial_number,rel.lock_serial_number AS lock_serial_number FROM rel_pda_user_port rel INNER JOIN lock_port_info pt ON pt.id = rel.port_info_id AND pt.del_flag = '0' and rel.pda_user_id = #{pdaUserId}) temp ON temp.ptid = pt.id where equ.del_flag= '0'
order by equ.id desc
select pt.* from rel_pda_user_port rel INNER JOIN lock_port_info pt ON pt.id = rel.port_info_id AND pt.del_flag = '0' where rel.pda_user_id = #{pdaUserId} group by pt.id
